attributes.action: legalise anal sex between consenting opposite sex couples.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Homosexual partners are permitted to take part in the act of anal sex in this country.

For hetrosexual partners, it is still illegal.  This is clearly unfair and could be considered a breach of our Human Rights.

To remain legal, we have to travel to Europe to partake in a natural and enjoyable passtime.

So long as it's within the confines of our homes and nobody else can see, we fail to see what harm we are doing anyone.

rejection.details: The claims in your petition are false. This practice is not illegal.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
